backend/main.mo: Minimal Motoko actor with no logic implemented.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping portfolio requirements to related source files, components, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file containing prewritten summaries for each frontend source file in the project.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base/style setup defining color tokens, dark theme variables, and global body/border styling.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML file that loads the React app via main.tsx with a root mounting point.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React component enabling dark mode and rendering all portfolio sections with navigation and footer.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Footer displaying copyright text and a caffeine.ai attribution link with tracking parameters.
frontend/src/components/ProjectCard.tsx: Reusable card component showing a project’s image, tools, problem, approach, and key outcomes.
frontend/src/components/sections/Contact: Renders a contact section with themed contact cards and a CTA, using configurable color classes.
frontend/src/components/sections/Experie: Displays a career experience timeline with two roles and achievements via a Timeline component.
frontend/src/components/sections/HeroSec: Builds a hero banner with background image, intro text, skill highlights, and buttons that smooth-scroll to sections.
frontend/src/components/sections/Project: Shows a portfolio section rendering multiple detailed project cards with problems, approaches, and outcomes.
frontend/src/components/sections/SkillsS: Renders categorized skill cards with icons and color themes for technical and analytical competencies.
frontend/src/components/Timeline.tsx: Timeline component rendering experience entries with period, company, description, and achievements.
frontend/src/components/TopNav.tsx: Sticky top navigation bar with smooth scrolling, scroll-based styling, and a responsive mobile menu.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Custom hook that creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, refreshing dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and provider for managing Internet Identity auth using AuthClient, including login, logout, and status state.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Empty placeholder file indicating no backend queries are needed for the static portfolio.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles, theming variables, dark mode colors, utilities, and custom scroll and gradient styles.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider before rendering App.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending theme colors, fonts, animations, utilities, and enabling plugins like typography and container queries.
project_state.json: Describes the portfolio project's state, features, requirements, images, and metadata for the React dark‑theme data analyst site.
